text: Today's bridge collapse on the M1 in Sandton. RIP to those who lost their lives and speedy recovery… https://instagram.com/p/801aT3Fk3x/
Tau says park n rides facilities will be free and are the best bet to get around affected areas on Thursday. #BridgeCollapse
The North Gods couldn't even divinely intervene in the #BridgeCollapse
SA: Shoddy workmanship or bad luck, M1 bridge collapse http://m.news24.com/news24/SouthAfrica/News/Pedestrian-bridge-across-M1-Grayston-collapses-20151014?isapp=true … pic.twitter.com/n1sPNQcP36
Tau: We need to keep people off this road than on this road @ANN7tv #BridgeCollapse #Grayston #DStv405
Tau: Park and rides will be free tomorrow. #BridgeCollapse
Parks Tau:  We will not be charging people at the the park and ride tomorrow #Grayston #BridgeCollapse pic.twitter.com/CO9MAjqLXr

Great feedback from @ParksTauCOJ on SABC3 regarding #BridgeCollapse  
Encouraging people to use the free park and rides.
